strings.Value: "Shyka, Magdh, and the Lost Prince. The Eldest of time, fate and solitude. A truly amusing company has gathered here."
"You three are the Eldest who participated in the trial over Nyrissa, is that not so? So her curse is your punishment as well?"
"We need help in confronting the Lantern King and his curse."

{n}Nyrissa looks back at you, as if urging for support, and keeps speaking with confidence.{/n} "Why are you here then, the Many? And why did you come to my house? Perhaps this pathetic screech interests you in some way?"

{n}Nyrissa seems more fragile than she used to be — and more determined. She doesn't turn around, but apparently senses you approaching, straightens her shoulders and breaks the silence.{/n} "Will the {g|Eldest}Eldest{/g} hear me out?"
"The {g|Eldest}Eldest{/g} will," {n}says the figure in a green robe. The whole world shivers slightly at the sound of her voice.{/n}
"Is it worth it?" {n}Replies the figure in grey-blue, who you recognize as {d|AnotherShyka}Shyka{/d}.{/n} "There is so much noise in the world. Why do we have to listen to this pathetic screech?"

"You wanted to become one of the {g|Eldest}Eldest{/g}, girl. But still you seem to barely understand what we are and what drives us. But enough. Since you are here…" {n}{g|Shyka}Shyka{/g} turns their head slightly toward you.{/n} "… ask."

"This is the {g|LanternKing}Lantern King's{/g} game." {n}The dark-haired {g|Eldest}Eldest{/g} breaks his silence for the first time. His voice is bleak and unemotional, but there is a note of disapproval in it — so faint that you wonder if you imagined it.{/n} "We were present, but hardly participated."

"Transgressions and punishments, questions asked and answers received — an eternal cycle. A great price must be paid for a daring scheme, Nyrissa. However..." {n}the figure in green pauses{/n} "... I think the {g|LanternKing}Lantern King{/g} asked more of you than was due. Much more."
"What makes you think we will help?"

"And we do not. We can scarcely remember a timeline when we weren't annoyed by your vanity, nymph girl. Well, you're lucky that the {g|LanternKing}Lantern King{/g} annoys us even more. So we won't mind... disrupting his plans a little bit."

"Clever child. We remain gratified by dwellers of the {g|Material Plane}Material Plane{/g}!" {n}{g|Shyka}Shyka{/g} turns around to the dark-haired {g|Eldest}Eldest{/g}.{/n} "What do you say, Prince? Aren't our guests from {g|Golarion}Golarion{/g} the most amusing creatures? You should come out of your tower and visit these lands... You might even conduct the next Inconsequent Debates!"

"Intuition, I suppose." {n}{g|Shyka}Shyka{/g} chuckles.{/n} "Let us stop weaving words. We can help you... even both of you. But help must be deserved. If you wish to start again, start your journey from the end!"
"Very well, so be it. I know how I can help you, and I know what price I will demand for it. Come to me when you are ready for a trial by fear. I will not be far."

{n}Nyrissa looks at you with sad blue eyes.{/n} "It's always difficult to deal with the higher powers. They toy with us, but without their help we wouldn't have a chance against the {g|LanternKing}Lantern King{/g}. Let's talk to all three of them and find out what they want!"
{n}Shyka's offer seems to fall on deaf ears. The dark-haired {g|Eldest}Eldest{/g} pays no attention, studying the soil beside the toe of his boot.{/n}
